wikipedia_page.main: Sergeant Frank Johnson  (28 December 1896 – 1961) was a World War I flying ace credited with 16 aerial victories. He flew as both an observer/gunner and as a pilot, and is the only enlisted man to receive a second award of the Distinguished Conduct Medal.

response: * Frankie Darro (1917–1976), American actor born Frank Johnson Jr.
